title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9605.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9605.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to effectuate the provisions of
article 8, title 6, section 1743.2 of the Public Authorities Law as amended and

Administrative Code, section 6-108.1 as amended in relation to awarding New

York City School Construction Authority (the "Authority") contracts and
subcontracts to Locally Based Enterprises (LBEs) and Graduate Locally Based

Enterprises (GLBEs). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
9605.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
